This scheme complements the LEITHY energy backscatter introduced in [#171](https://github.com/NCAR/cesm_dev/issues#171), with its effects expected to be more pronounced at higher latitudes and in western boundary current regions.

cases.purpose:
revert to cam6 emissions ordering
- In cam6, emissions were applied to the state after PBL mixing. 
- In cam7, we changed the emissions to before PBL mixing (CLUBB). The new process ordering could lead to elevated burdens since the PBL mixing could move constituents out of the first level and avoid removal by dry deposition that occurs downstream in the time loop.

cases.purpose:
B1850_LTso run with an evolving Greenland ice sheet to test climate equilibrium sensitivity.
___
cases.description:
This run restarts from year 69 of run 280 ([#249](url)) with an evolving Greenland ice sheet. 
The Greenland ice sheet was initialized using an SMB and air temperature climatology from run 280 spanning years 49-88. 
The goal is to analyze the impact on each component's equilibrium compared to run 280. The impact of the evolving ice sheet should be minimal (though not zero).
The cism source mod addition is to fix a bug in CISM on reading the right initial field for the inverted basal friction coefficients.
